nodes.bodyText: Did we remove the percentage facility? i.e. if < 1, the bucket cache is a percentage of heap? We only do hard size in MBs now?
From the code and the test results, yes.
Yes Stack.  The bucket cache size can only be specified as absolute MBs value.  we no longer support on heap Bucket cache and so size as % of heap.  And min value for this is 1. (1 MB)
